author: smuzaffar
body:
- code-checks/format applied on full cmssw with extra misc-definitions-in-headers clang-tidy check
- clean up various headers to remove functions in global namespace  by either moving the function inside the class  or merging the `.h` and `.cc` files of plugins
- delete dead/unused code `RecoTracker/ConversionSeedGenerators/plugins/Conv4HitsReco.cc`
title: [RECONSTRUCTION] code-checks/format; clean code to remove global functions
